Package com.gcep.controller

Class RecipesRESTController

java.lang.Object
com.gcep.controller.RecipesRESTController
@RestController @CrossOrigin @RequestMapping("/recipes") public class RecipesRESTController extends Object
Provides the REST service endpoints for recipe data operations
Version:
0.1
Author:
Gabriel Cepleanu
